title: Order of Steps
text: First, find 3A, then 2B. Next, add them together.

title: Matrix Addition
text: Add corresponding entries. Add the entry in row $$1$$, column $$1$$, a11, of matrix A to the entry in row $$1$$, column $$1$$, b11, of B. Continue the pattern until all entries have been added.

title: Multiplying a Matrix by a Scalar
text: To multiply a matrix A by a scaler C, multiply each entry in A by C.
